title: Insect Plague
content:
Insect Plague Level 5 Conjuration Spell 4~40 Damage 4d10Piercing Locusts attack everyone within range, make the area Difficult Terrain, and impose Disadvantage on Perception Checks. 10 turns On Save: Targets still take half damage. 18mCON Save Concentration Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Level 5 Conjuration Spell

Locusts attack everyone within range, make the area Difficult Terrain, and impose Disadvantage on Perception Checks.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

18mCON Save Concentration

Insect Plague is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Insect Plague is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Insect Plague Information

Description: Locusts attack everyone within range, make the area Difficult Terrain, and impose Disadvantage on Perception Checks. Level: Lvl 5 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m 6m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: Constitution

How to Acquire Insect Plague

Insect Plague can be acquired by the following classes: Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer Insect Plague can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer
